1.2 Bayesian Regularization

The prior distribution introduces regularization in a natural way. Adding regularization to the cost function constrains the magnitude of the parameters. The same can be achieved by a the prior in a bayesian model, forcing smaller magnitudes by a higher probability around the origin.
